message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at the special introductory price of $200.  It's a fantastic deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can work out a better deal. Considering the value I believe the product holds, I'd like to propose a price of $160.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  How about we meet in the middle at $180?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $170.
